QuestData.Title: Arm the Wards!
QuestData.Description: We've succeeded in reactivating the crystal wards around the sanctum, but why stop there? We'll build defenses around the other structures, but the Wretched are stubborn and continue to steal power from the crystal wards.$B$BHunt them down and get the mana remnants they carry. Use the remnants to energize the sanctum wards; the safety of our operation depends on it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Captain Theris Dawnhearth at the Shattered Sun Staging Area wants you to obtain 4 Mana Remnants from Wretched Fiends and Wretched Devourers and use them to energize one of the Crystal Wards surrounding the structures in Sun's Reach.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Captain Theris Dawnhearth at the Shattered Sun Staging Area in Isle of Quel'Danas.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you reactivated a crystal ward, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: Good work, $n. The wards are slowly regaining their power. Sun's Reach will be ours in no time!
